title: Lolclient crashes
body: I'm just making a message to ask you why I keep having the lolclient crash mid-game. It used to minimize my league window and say it crashed, and somtimes while in champ select or even before a match. I still every now and again get dissconnected from the PVP service too, recently it's now gotten to where after match the game is just closed out so I can't even get to the screen with the champion scores and the last chat with home or play again... I'd like to know what is going on with this. Please and thank you.

replies.body:
Hi Raigen,

After reading your post, this strikes me of a connection issue that is causing these errors to occur either in the Client with PvP.net has connection issues, or even errors/crashes in Champion Selection.  To that end, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21696815

Also, when completing all of these steps, I strongly recommend that you make sure to complete the following two steps:

1) Make sure your IPv6 connection is completely disabled:  http://support.microsoft.com/kb/92985

2) Make sure that your Windows Firewall is disabled:   https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21682184-Disabling-Windows-Firewall

Once done, and if you are still experiencing issues, then I strongly recommend that you submit a ticket to Player Support, which you can do here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following information:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2)NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log 

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
I have the same problems all the time and I have tried everything I could find on youtube to help and it still didn't work, so you're not alone on with this problem
